title: Holistics Data
description:
Holistics helps data teams set up self-service experiences that are reliable and easy to maintain. 
With Holistics, data teams manage a central definition of business metrics and data logic in a code-based modeling layer. Business users explore data, build reports, and get accurate analytics in a governed environment. Dashboards, metrics and data logic can also be serialized into code, leveraging DevOps best practices like Git version control, reusability and refactoring.
